title: The Morris Worm Pt. 1
description: We’ve introduced you to some of the seminal malware attacks that have shaped cybersecurity history. Perhaps no other incident in history, though, has had the effect on how we think about computer security today as the Morris worm.
content:encoded:
We’ve introduced you to some of the seminal malware attacks that have shaped cybersecurity
history. Perhaps no other incident in history, though, has had the effect on how we think about
computer security today as the Morris worm.
